text: O Lucky Man! is a 1973 British fantasy comedy drama movie directed by Lindsay Anderson. It stars Malcolm McDowell, Ralph Richardson, Rachel Roberts, Helen Mirren, Arthur Lowe, Dandy Nichols, Warren Clarke, Bill Owen, James Bolam, Brian Glover, Edward Judd, Edward Peel, Margot Bennett and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was second of Mick Travis trilogy that started with if.... (1968) and finished with Britannia Hospital (1982). ==Other websites== * Category:1973 comedy-drama movies Category:1973 fantasy movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Lindsay Anderson Category:Movies set in England
title: O Lucky Man!
